newsitem.title: USA: QUALCOMM in supply pact with Chase.
newsitem.headline: QUALCOMM in supply pact with Chase.

text.p: QUALCOMM Inc said Thursday it has signed a binding letter of intent with Chase Telecommunications Inc to supply about $140 million of Personal Communications Services infrastructure equipment and services.
The equipment is based on QUALCOMM's Code Division Multiple Access technology. QUALCOMM also said it will make a $4 million equity investment in Chase.
Under the terms of the deal QUALCOMM will provide Chase with base stations and base station controllers, turnkey deployment services, radio frequency design and training and network planning.
Chase has PCS licenses in 11 areas covering about 6.3 million people throughout Tennessee and parts of six surrounding states.
